Uses of Class
org.jboss.elemento.logger.Logger

Packages that use Logger
Package
Description
org.jboss.elemento.logger
Provides a lightweight logging wrapper around console.log that uses categories, log levels, and a predefined log format.

  • Uses of Logger in org.jboss.elemento.logger

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Logger
    Logger.getLogger(String category)
    Retrieves or creates a logger with the specified category.
